projectConfigurationDescription: Here you can configure the project environment.
setAreaValuesDescription: Configure width, height, and device count for the simulation.
checkConsoleForDetails: Check the console for form values.
checkConsoleForDevices: Check the console for device details.
fillWidthHeightAndDeviceCount: Fill width, height, and device count.
projectConfigDescription: Here you can configure the project settings.
simulationConfigDescription: Here you can configure the simulation parameters.
gatewayQuantityAlgorithmDescription: Choose an algorithm to determine the optimal number of gateways based on statistical methods. The Elbow Method and Gap-Statistic are used to find the most efficient configuration.
gatewayPositioningAlgorithmDescription: Select an algorithm for optimal gateway positioning to ensure effective coverage and connectivity. Each method provides a different approach to solving the positioning problem.
simulationNameDescription: Enter a unique name for your simulation to identify it easily in future references.
simulationDescriptionPlaceholder: Write a brief description of the simulation
simulationDescriptionDetails: Provide a short description of what your simulation will analyze.
simulationScenarioPlaceholder: Select the scenario type to be simulated
simulationScenarioDescription: Different settings can significantly affect results and model behavior.
simulationWidthPlaceholder: Enter the width parameter in meters
simulationWidthDescription: Specify the width parameter for the simulation area in meters. This determines the horizontal scale.
simulationHeightPlaceholder: Enter the height parameter in meters
simulationHeightDescription: Specify the height parameter for the simulation area or component in meters. This determines the vertical scale.
devicesQuantityDescription: Specify the number of devices to be used in the simulation.
simulationTimePlaceholder: Enter the simulation time in seconds
simulationTimeDescription: This value will determine the total period of the simulation.
numberOfPacketsPlaceholder: Enter the number of packets to send
numberOfPacketsDescription: Specify how many packets should be sent during the simulation.
propagationLossModelDescription: Choose the propagation loss model suitable for your simulation.
simulationResultsDescription: Below are the results of your simulation. You can copy the data, export it as a CSV file, or use it in your application.
exportInstructions: You can export the results to a file or copy the data above for further use.
enterYourEmailBelow: Enter your email below to login to your account
loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials
loginRequired: Login is required to access this feature.

register.enterYourDetails: Enter your details to create an account
register.name: Full Name
